text.tspan: Talented (PA) - You gain one Talent Increase. Requires the "Mage" Major
Secret Language (PA) - You know an obscure, forbidden, or exclusive form
of communication. Work with your Game Master to determine what exactly
Practical Knowledge (PA) - Whenever you gain information from a Skill
Check that used brilliance you also get +1 on the first Check you make when
Prepared (PA) - You begin each Encounter with 1 additional Inspiration
Eagle Eyed (1R) [NA] {1Discipline} - Double the Range Increment of your
Combat Techniques until the beginning of your next Turn
Protected (PA) - The first successful Attack Check against you each
Focused Efforts (1E) [RE] {-} - For the remainder of the Round, Discipline
may be Strained instead of Physique.
Singular Focus (1R) [RE] {-} - At the start of your Turn select a Character
and Suffer 1 Drain. You gain a +1 to all Checks against that Character, and
they Suffer -1 to all Checks against you until you have no more Drain
Mage (PA) - You are able to use the Casting Skills and Invocations
See the Patterns (PA) - Any time you make an Research Skill Check that
results in a Major Success you may ask one of the following: What is the
relationship between this and ____; What is a good way to take advantage
Quick Assessment (PA) - At the beginning of each Encounter select up two
Hostile Characters. You learn two of the following for those Characters:
Discovered a magic tome while studying to
become a doctor. It gave her access magic
and great power. Wants more and more
Precise {1} - You get a +1 bonus on
Impossible Knowledge - Name a Character, Object, or location. For a short
time you know or can do two of the following: Its general direction; Its general
distance from you; You can understand/speak/read a language related to it;
You can ask one simple question about it that the Game Master answers.
Strengthened, select one: Select three Effects; Learn an obscure fact about it.
Restoration - Select a Character you can touch and select one of the
following: Restore up to 10 Vigor; Remove all Bleed; Remove all Drain.
Strengthened, select one: Select two Effects; Select up to three Characters;
Shroud Stride - Select a Space within 10 Spaces of you that you can
Perceive. You appear in that Space along with any Objects you are carrying.
Weakened: Something important gets left behind.
Strengthened, select one: Select a Space within 20 Spaces; Up to two willing
Characters within 2 Spaces of you also appear at the selected Space; For a
very brief time after you may use a Normal Action to return your original
